gwt.g3d.client.gl2.array
Class WebGLIntArray

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      gwt.g3d.client.gl2.array.WebGLArray
          gwt.g3d.client.gl2.array.WebGLIntArray
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class WebGLIntArray
extends WebGLArray

A WebGLIntArray represents an array of 32-bit signed integer values. A WebGLIntArray has an element size of 4 bytes.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

createArray

public static WebGLIntArray createArray(int length)
Deprecated. 
Create a new WebGLIntArray object of the given length with a new underlying WebGLArrayBuffer large enough to hold length elements of the specific type. Data in the buffer is initialized to 0.

Parameters:
length -

createArray

public static WebGLIntArray createArray(WebGLArrayBuffer buffer,
                                        int byteOffset,
                                        int length)
Deprecated. 
Create a new WebGLIntArray object using the passed WebGLArrayBuffer for its storage. If a given byteOffset and length references an area beyond the end of the WebGLArrayBuffer an exception is raised.

Parameters:
buffer -
byteOffset - indicates the offset in bytes from the start of the WebGLArrayBuffer. must be a multiple of the element size of the specific type, otherwise an exception is raised.
length - the count of elements from the offset that this WebGLIntArray will reference

get

public final int get(int index)
Deprecated. 
Return the element at the given index. If the index is out of range, an exception is raised. This is an index getter function, and may be invoked via array index syntax where applicable.

Parameters:
index -

set

public final void set(int index,
                      int value)
Deprecated. 
Sets the element at the given index to the given value. If the index is out of range, an exception is raised. This is an index setter function, and may be invoked via array index syntax where applicable. If the given value is out of range for the type of the array, a C-style cast operation is performed to coerce the value to the valid range. No clamping or rounding is performed.

Parameters:
index -
value -
